name: AXEL.win
description: The AXEL Lending Platform is a decentralized finance (DeFi) project operating on PulseChain, a low-fee blockchain fork of Ethereum launched in 2021. The platform centers around the axel.win token, which facilitates a lending and borrowing ecosystem. It features a token launchpad that enables new projects to introduce their tokens and a lending platform where users can create customizable vaults. These vaults allow lenders to set terms such as loan duration (1-365 days) and accepted collaterals, while borrowers can access funds instantly with pre-funded liquidity. The project aims to enhance financial accessibility within the PulseChain ecosystem, supporting a variety of tokens including NOPE, AXIS, and FIRE. By leveraging smart contracts, AXEL eliminates intermediaries, aligning with DeFiâ€™s core principles of transparency and user control. The platform fosters a community-driven approach, encouraging participation from token holders and developers alike.
